title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 9606.3 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 9606.3 - Applicability

State Regulations

These guidelines apply to all business enterprises who wish
to certify with the authority as minority or women owned firms pursuant to
article 8, title 6, section
1743
of
the Public Authorities Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
9606.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
